creator: the.webmaestro@gmail.com
text:
Small updates to Apache XML Graphics Charter. PATCH contains 3 files, current 'immutable' charter: 
XMLGraphicsProjectCharter:
	ApacheXMLGraphicsProjectCharter.txt (current)
	ApacheXMLGraphicsProjectCharterB.txt (Clay's mods)
	xmlgcharter.txt (diff -u ApacheXMLGraphicsProjectCharter.txt 
ApacheXMLGraphicsProjectCharterB.txt > xmlgcharter.txt

You have to properly register first to be able to edit any Wiki pages. Click 
on "UserPreferences" in the upper right corner.

Thanks for helping with the charter. Reminds me that we should finish that 
task for the next board meeting (Wed, 23 Feb 2005, 10am Pacific) where we need 
to send our next project report.
creator: jeremias@apache.org

text:
After I submitted this bug, I modified the charter itself, so this bug is CLOSED. Move along folks, there's 
nothing to see here. Have a nice day!
creator: the.webmaestro@gmail.com
gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
